data.title: California State University, San Bernardino
data.meta_description: We welcome you to be part of the #Coyote4Life family! Get the information you need to Join the Pack – Schedule a campus tour, explore our degree offerings and learn why CSUSB

Important Dates

Coyote Stories

Steve Vivian '00 credits his time as president of Delta Sigma Chi, vice chairman of the Santos Manuel Student Union, and vice president of the accounting association for helping him grow his skillsets.

- Steve Vivian, '00

Sharon Velarde Pierce is a three-time CSUSB alumna (BA ’13, MA ’14 public administration, Ed.D. ’17 educational leadership), or, as CSUSB President Morales said, “a Coyote through and through.”

- Sharon Pierce, PH.D.

CSU Future Scholars scholarship recipient Alyssa Smith enjoys CSUSB for its affordability and proximity to home, allowing her to have a full college experience while staying close to her support system.

- Alyssa Smith

Two-time alumnus, professor and director of the School of Entrepreneurship, Mike Stull, is the director of the Inland Empire Center for Entrepreneurship at CSUSB.

- Mike Stull, D.M.
